title: AWS SQS Queue Event Source
description: Receive events via an AWS SQS queue. Supports all authentication methods supported by boto library.

source_type.description: The type of event source (hidden field)

session_token.description: Optional STS session token for use with temporary credentials

endpoint_url.description: Optional URL to connect to instead of the default AWS endpoints

queue_owner_aws_account_id.description: Optional The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account that created the queue. Required when accessing a queue owned by another AWS account

delay_seconds.description: The SQS long polling duration. Set to 0 to disable

max_number_of_messages.description: Optional The maximum number of messages to return. Amazon SQS never returns more messages than this value (however, fewer messages might be returned). Valid values are 1 to 10
